Package doerfer

Class AdvancedGameConfiguration

java.lang.Object
doerfer.AdvancedGameConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
doerfer.preset.GameConfiguration
public class AdvancedGameConfiguration extends Object implements doerfer.preset.GameConfiguration
Class AdvancedGameConfiguration, implements GameConfiguration A class that reads the configuration File and creates the data to use in the game
